H0.text: Who married Heidi Klum in May 2005. David Hasselhoff

H1.text: Who married Heidi Klum in May 2005. Usher

H2.text: Who married Heidi Klum in May 2005. Matthew McConaughey

H3.text: Who married Heidi Klum in May 2005. Seal

A4.text: Klum and Seal got engaged in December 2004 on a glacier in Whistler, British Columbia, and married on 10 May 2005 on a beach in Mexico.
